post.text: Trump owes the country an apology for all of the horrible things he's said and done. And by the way: "Sorry if you were offended" doesn't count.

comment.author: Joshua
comment.text: When will she apologize for attacking a 12 year old girl who was raped by a 40 year old man? When will she apologize for blaming the girl for being raped? When will she admit to benefiting from helping a child rapist escape justice?

replies.author: Vanessa
replies.text: Never can she lives in an alternative universe where she believes that she can't do no wrong. That's why people like Hillary, well, they shouldn't be given any government position, much less become the next POTUS after her disastrous tenure as SOS. How people still vouch for her shows we have a lot of mentally sick people in this country.

replies.author: Finn
replies.text: I read the whole transcript , every word . It's a sad case. But She did her job nothing more.

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: Finn Then it was legal, but uncommon for attorneys to blame rape victims. The practice was so outrageous, it is not prohibited. She didn't have to blame the rape on that child. That isn't the kind of self-serving behavior we should tolerate from someone who wants to hold any high elected office.
